optionLines: Sounds great. You guys said it will have a surprising halftime show, right?
Oh, I got it. I have seen some interesting advertisements from here before.
Wow, so the trophy you just mentioned is for the winner of the Super Bowl?
Haha! Actually, making dumplings is very interesting. Come and have a try next time.
It is very easy to cook and healthy. Also, it's one-bite size makes it very cute. Right?
The dumpling is a very traditional food in Spring Festivals and means a lot in our culture.
Just like the Super Bowl! Everyone gets back home and enjoys family time!
Haha. Don’t overthink it! So we get the second chance to celebrate the new year!
It’s a little bit hard to explain...
